name: Chainmail Armor
desc: Armor set made of chainmail

name: Large Shield
desc: shield made of metal

name: Leather Armor
desc: Armor set made of leather

name: Studded Leather Armor
desc: Armor set made of leather and small stud plates.

name: Platemail Armor
desc: Armor set made of solid metal plates

name: Robes
desc: Armor set made of cloth

name: Camping Kit
desc: Allows the party to rest until fully recovered.

name: Emerald
desc: Emerald Gem

name: Gold Ring
desc: Ring made of solid gold

name: Golden Goblet
desc: Golden Goblet

name: Lanterna History
desc: This is a complete History of Lanterna. You are very familiar with this book since you have studied it in school. Here are the main events...

name: Kendra's Ring
desc: Ring made of solid gold. It has Kendra's family name engraved on the side of the band.

name: Ring of Protection
desc: A ring with a shimmer of magic. Increases AC by one point.

name: Ring of Fire Resistance
desc: Ring made of solid gold that grants a 30% resistance to fire.

name: Healing Potion
desc: heals the user of minor wounds (+8 HP)

name: Extra Healing Potion
desc: heals the user of moderate wounds (+16 hp)

name: Spell Points Potion
desc: user regains some spell points (+20 SP)

name: Battle Axe
desc: Battle axe of standard construction

name: Crossbow
desc: crossbow made of common materials

name: Dagger
desc: small blade

name: Elvish Short Sword +1
desc: This magic weapon has a +1 enhancement bonus to attack and damage. It was forged and enchanted by the Western Elves during the early years of the world. It is known to give courage to those who wield the sword.

name: Fire Dagger
desc: dagger of standard construction that also causes an additional 1-2 point(s) of fire damage on a successful hit.

name: Flaming Long Sword
desc: Long blade of standard construction that also causes an additional 2-3 points of fire damage on a successful hit.

name: Hand Axe
desc: Hand axe of standard construction

name: Long Bow
desc: long bow constructed of common materials

name: Long Sword
desc: Long blade of standard construction

name: Mace
desc: Mace of standard construction

name: Short Bow
desc: short bow made of common materials

name: Short Sword
desc: a short sword constructed of standard but sound materials

name: Sling
desc: small sling made of common materials

name: Sling of Fire
desc: small sling made of common materials that adds 1 point of fire damage.

name: Spear
desc: Spear of standard construction

name: Vial of Poison
desc: This is a vial of poison, the same poison being used to pollute the river and making the Langdale people sick. You should probably keep this as evidence.

name: Ian's Letter
desc:
This letter was written yesterday by your brother, Ian.

"To my family and friends,

I have recovered well enough to leave this place and find my companions.  The Elder Elves, here in Lorenwaite, think I still need time to heal, but every day that goes by is a day that my friends may not survive.  I must try and find them.  I will return to Brinsby shortly, hopefully with our friends.

Ian"

name: Letter to the kobold king
desc:
This letter appears to have been written recently.

"...You have delayed long enough.  The time for you to carry out your orders is now.  I will be sending one of my loyal servants to give further instructions once you have completed the task at hand.

Z..."

name: Arrow
desc: Basic arrows of standard construction.

name: Stone
desc: Basic stone used by slings.

name: Stone of Fire
desc: Stone used by slings. These stones add fire damage.

name: Magic Amulet
desc: A test item for testing Conversations starting from item use

name: Magic Book
desc: A test item for testing Encounters starting from item use...this item is set to be destroyed after use.

name: Bolt
desc: Basic bolts of standard construction. Used with crossbows.

name: Kangath's Axe
desc: A huge two-handed axe, inscribed with runes, that clearly has significance for Kangath.

name: Mace +1
desc: This mace has a slight glow to it, indicating enchantment.

name: Harvellen Crypt Key
desc: An old iron key with the word "Harvellen" written on it.

name: Shovel
desc: A sturdy shovel. Useful for digging holes.

name: Strange Instructions
desc:
The scrawled handwriting on the note is nearly as faded as the yellow parchment it is written on. Most of it is illegible.

".... keeping it safe from the others... don't trust the halfling... has been watching me, I think he knows about the blade... and buried it at the pyramid.... screw the halfwits!"

name: Long Sword +1
desc: An enchanted longsword. The edge of the blade glints with menace.

name: Mangon Platemail +2
desc:
This enchanted plate mail armor was crafted by the ogre-mage Mangon during a brief in captivity by agents of the Peldine Empire. When Mangon eventually escaped, leaving a trail of carnage behind him, he also left the armor... with a note that whoever followed him would need to wear it. 

The armor grants +2 to defence.

name: Krill
desc:
The white-metal blade "Krill" has a fearsome reputation. For years it was wielded by the pirate known as Whitelaw during his forays along the Blackwinter coast. Countless merchants and sailors met their end on its blade. Whitelaw was eventually slain in combat by the Captain of the Blackwinter Guard, Serdus Brin, and it is now put to use quelling rebellions and riots in the ciy.

Krill grants +3 to hit and +3 damage.

name: Shield of the Stone
desc:
The Shield of the Stone is made from the remains of a meteorite that landed somewhere south of the Mirthal forest. It is significantly heavier than a metal shield but perversely the wielder actually feels stronger whilst holding it.

Exactly where the meteorite came from... remains unknown. 

The Shield of the Stone functions as a large shield +2, and grants +1 strength.

name: new item
desc: enter item's description here

name: Dorian's Master Key
desc: A master key for Dorian's house.
